00056 //--------------------------------------------
00057 void BdkDalitzPdfHolder1::init(const char * theName,
00058                                const char * theDesc,
00059                                RooAbsReal & m12,
00060                                RooAbsReal & m13,
00061                                BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flavor, 
00062                                BdkPdfDKDalitz::COORD coord,
00063                                BdkDalitzEff* effDKGoodD,
00064                                BdkDalitzEff* effOther,
00065                                const char * DPiXfileName,
00066                                const char * sigBadD0fileName,
00067                                RooCategory& blindMode,
00068                                BdkDalitzPdfHolder1* pdfSource,
00069                                Bool_t flipQqGoodDFlavor) {
00070 
00071   SetNameTitle(theName, theDesc);
00072   _m12 = &m12;
00073   _m13 = &m13;
00074   _flavor = flavor;
00075   _effDKGoodD = effDKGoodD;
00076   _effOther = effOther;
00077   _blindMode = &blindMode;
00078 
00079   BdkDDalitzAmp* externalAmp = 0;
00080   if (pdfSource != 0) externalAmp = (BdkDDalitzAmp*)pdfSource->sigGoodD0Type().dalitzAmp();
00081 
00082   _sigGoodD0.init(TString(GetName()) + ".sigGoodD0", 
00083                   TString(GetTitle()) + " sigGoodD0",
00084                   *_m12, *_m13, _flavor, coord, _blindMode, externalAmp);
00085 
00086   _sigGoodD0.setEfficiencyFunc(effDKGoodD);
00087 
00088   _DpiGoodD0.init(TString(GetName()) + ".DpiGoodD0", 
00089                   TString(GetTitle()) + " DpiGoodD0",
00090                   *_m12, *_m13, _flavor,(BdkDDalitzAmp*)_sigGoodD0.dalitzAmp());
00091 
00092   _DpiGoodD0.setEfficiencyFunc(effDKGoodD);
00093 
00094   _BBgoodD0.init(TString(GetName()) + ".BBGoodD0", 
00095                  TString(GetTitle()) + " BBGoodDo",
00096                  *_m12, *_m13, _flavor,(BdkDDalitzAmp*)_sigGoodD0.dalitzAmp());
00097 
00098   _BBgoodD0.setEfficiencyFunc(effDKGoodD);
00099 
00100   BdkDalitzBase::Flavor qqGoodDFlavor = _flavor;
00101 
00102   if (flipQqGoodDFlavor) {
00103     if (_flavor==BdkDalitzBase::D0) qqGoodDFlavor = BdkDalitzBase::D0BAR;
00104     else qqGoodDFlavor = BdkDalitzBase::D0;
00105   }
00106   _qqGoodD0.init(TString(GetName()) + ".qqGoodD0", 
00107                  TString(GetTitle()) + " qqGoodD0",
00108                  *_m12, *_m13, qqGoodDFlavor,(BdkDDalitzAmp*)_sigGoodD0.dalitzAmp());
00109 
00110   _qqGoodD0.setEfficiencyFunc(effDKGoodD);
00111 
00112   // The incoherent PDFs all have "spin-0" rhos. The resonant
00113   // components are instantiated once for _DpiBadD0, and then reused
00114   // in the other bad D PDFs:
00115   const int incRhoSpin = 0;
00116 
00117   // If we have a PDF source use the same DpiBad PDF
00118   _DpiBadD0.init(TString(GetName()) + ".DpiBadD0", 
00119                  TString(GetTitle()) + " DpiBadD0",
00120                  *_m12, *_m13, _flavor, incRhoSpin,
00121                  pdfSource ? &pdfSource->DpiBadD0Type() : 0);
00122 
00123   _DpiBadD0.setEfficiencyFunc(effOther);
00124 
00125   _DKX.init(TString(GetName()) + ".DKX", 
00126             TString(GetTitle()) + " DKX",
00127             _DpiBadD0);
00128 
00129   _DKX.setEfficiencyFunc(effOther);
00130 
00131   _BBbadD0.init(TString(GetName()) + ".BBBadD0", 
00132                 TString(GetTitle()) + " BBBadD0",
00133                 _DpiBadD0);
00134   
00135   _BBbadD0.setEfficiencyFunc(effOther);
00136 
00137   _qqBadD0.init(TString(GetName()) + ".qqBadD0", 
00138                 TString(GetTitle()) + " qqBadD0",
00139                 _DpiBadD0);
00140 
00141   _qqBadD0.setEfficiencyFunc(effOther);
00142 
00143 
00144   initSigBadD0Hist(sigBadD0fileName);
00145   initDPiXHist(DPiXfileName);
00146 }

00148 //--------------------------------------------
00149 void BdkDalitzPdfHolder1::initDPiXHist(const char * filename) {
00150   // Build DPiX HistPdf:  
00151   if (0 == filename) {
00152     return;
00153   }
00154 
00155   TFile f(filename, "READ");
00156   if(f.IsZombie()) {
00157     cout << " unable to open " << filename << endl;
00158     return;
00159   }
00160 
00161   _ownedDPiXHist = (TH2*)f.Get("hist_dpix");
00162   _ownedDPiXHist->SetDirectory(gROOT);
00163   f.Close();
00164 
00165   setDPiXHist(*_ownedDPiXHist);
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 //--------------------------------------------
00170 void BdkDalitzPdfHolder1::setDPiXHist(const TH2& h2) 
00171 {
00172   if (BdkDalitzBase::D0 == _flavor)
00173     _DPiX.init(TString(GetName())+".DPiX", 
00174                TString(GetTitle())+" DPiX",
00175                *_m12, *_m13, BdkDalitzBase::D0, h2);
00176   else
00177     _DPiX.init(TString(GetName())+".DPiX", 
00178                TString(GetTitle())+" DPiX",
00179                *_m13, *_m12, BdkDalitzBase::D0BAR, h2);
00180   
00181   // Restore uniform binning:
00182   if (dynamic_cast<RooRealVar*>(_m12)) ((RooRealVar*)_m12)->setBins(100);
00183   if (dynamic_cast<RooRealVar*>(_m13)) ((RooRealVar*)_m13)->setBins(100);
00184 }
00185 
00186 
00187 
00188 //--------------------------------------------
00189 void BdkDalitzPdfHolder1::initSigBadD0Hist(const char * filename)
00190 {
00191    // Build sigBadD0 HistPdf:  
00192   if (0 == filename) {
00193     return;
00194   }
00195 
00196   TFile f(filename, "READ");
00197   if(f.IsZombie()) {
00198     cout << " unable to open " << filename << endl;
00199     return;
00200   }
00201 
00202   _ownedSigBadD0Hist = (TH2*)f.Get("hist_dkbadd");
00203   _ownedSigBadD0Hist->SetDirectory(gROOT);
00204   f.Close();
00205 
00206   setSigBadD0Hist(*_ownedSigBadD0Hist);
00207 }

00210 //--------------------------------------------
00211 void BdkDalitzPdfHolder1::setSigBadD0Hist(const TH2& h2) 
00212 {
00213   if (BdkDalitzBase::D0 == _flavor)
00214     _sigBadD0.init(TString(GetName())+".sigBadD0", 
00215                    TString(GetTitle())+" sigBadD0",
00216                    *_m12, *_m13, BdkDalitzBase::D0, h2);
00217   else
00218     _sigBadD0.init(TString(GetName())+".sigBadD0", 
00219                    TString(GetTitle())+" sigBadD0",
00220                    *_m13, *_m12, BdkDalitzBase::D0, h2);
00221   
00222   // Restore uniform binning:
00223   if (dynamic_cast<RooRealVar*>(_m12)) ((RooRealVar*)_m12)->setBins(100);
00224   if (dynamic_cast<RooRealVar*>(_m13)) ((RooRealVar*)_m13)->setBins(100);
00225 }
